text.p: Ralston Purina Co said Friday W. Patrick McGinnis and J. Patrick Mulcahy were named co-chief executive officers of the company, effective October 1.

McGinnis, president and chief executive officer of Ralston's pet products group, and Mulcahy, chairman and chief executive officer of Ralston's Eveready Battery Co, were also elected to the board of directors.
Ralston said William Stiritz, chairman, chief executive officer and president, will retire on September 30 but remain chairman.
He also will serve as chairman and chief executive officer of the international agricultural feeds business, which Ralston expects to spin off in early 1998.
Stiritz, who will be 63 on July 1, has served as Ralston's chief executive officer since 1981.
